file_content.text: Thank you so much.
Oh, thank goodness you've got our equipment. I've got word of another group of settlers not far from here. We'll probably set up camp together.
You might want to set up in a safer place this time.
Stay clear of pirates.
We'll take your advice to heart.
Those pirates paid dearly.
It was nothing--at least you've lived to start over.
You're lucky to be alive.
I smell blood--pirate blood. Stinky, gooey pirate blood.
The pirates are all dead, Ivan. Now we can leave. We can build a new settlement. Let's go.
Please, we need the equipment for our camp so we can finally move on and begin to live again.
Y--you don't look like a pirate. You're not a pirate, are you? Please tell me you're not a pirate.
Don't mind him, Jedi.
Don't mind him, Captain.
Don't mind him, soldier.
Don't mind him.
Pirates attacked our settlement and fed his family to the rakghouls.
None of us have been the same, really. Perhaps--perhaps you can help us?
Nobody should go through what this man has. Tell me what I can do.
If I possibly can.
That depends on what you want me to do.
It's possible.
It's survival of the fittest out here.
I don't have time for this.
First pirate that crosses my path... bang! Feed him to the rakghouls! See how he likes it!
Look--maybe he's not all there, but all of us know how he feels. We built a settlement out here.
We defended it from rakghouls. We started families. And those pirates attacked and took everything!
It's hard not to want revenge, but mostly, we just need to move on. Start a new settlement, on a different part of the planet maybe.
How do you intend to do that?
What's your plan?
How can I assist?
If you want to stay on Taris, you're as loopy as your friend.
You're crazy.
We've already invested so much in this place. We can't leave now.
We had equipment at our camp that made Taris liveable, protected us from the rakghouls.
If we can get that equipment back, we can start over. Maybe start to forget, and heal. Can you help?
I'll help.
I'm busy, but I'll see.
Anything for a chance to kick in some pirate skulls.
Revenge is sweet.
Stay calm, Ivan. It's gonna be okay.
